ComicInfo.Summary:
In "Dead Billy Dead, Part 8," everything Billy has been through so far comes to a particularly nasty conclusion. Although it's not half as bad as what happens to Professor Saxon... meanwhile, in part 8 of "Juarez," Lex Nova looks to wrap up his case, but, as with most things in Lex's life, this wrap-up goes horribly awry.
